scripts.dev: bun run generate:api && bun --hot main.ts | pino-pretty
scripts.build: bun run generate:api && bun build ./main.ts --outdir ./prod --target bun
scripts.lint:all: bun run lint && bun run format:check
scripts.fix:all: bun run lint:fix && bun run format
scripts.generate:api: rm -rf generated && bun run docs:bundle:internal && openapi-code-generator --input ./docs/generated/openapi-internal.yaml --input-type openapi3 --output ./generated --template typescript-express --schema-builder zod-v3 --grouping-strategy first-tag && bun run scripts/generateOutputTypes.ts
scripts.generate:bruno: bun run docs:bundle:internal && bun run scripts/generateBrunoCollection.ts
scripts.generate:all: bun run docs:bundle && bun run generate:api && bun run generate:bruno
scripts.docs:bundle:internal: redocly bundle internal -o ./docs/generated/openapi-internal.yaml --remove-unused-components && bun run scripts/stripInternalTags.ts
scripts.docs:serve: bun run docs:bundle && chokidar 'docs/openapi/**/*.yaml' -c 'bun run docs:bundle' & scalar document serve -w docs/generated/openapi.yaml
scripts.docs:serve:internal: bun run docs:bundle:internal && chokidar 'docs/openapi/**/*.yaml' -c 'bun run docs:bundle:internal' & scalar document serve -w docs/generated/openapi-internal.yaml
